sentence.Network_en: He was diagnosed as severely dyslexic but extraordinarily bright.
sentence.Network_cn: 他被诊断患有严重的阅读困难症，但是却绝顶聪明。

sentence.Network_en: The American continent's geography severely limited the lines of attack.
sentence.Network_cn: 美洲大陆的地形严重限制了进攻路线。

sentence.Network_en: Nearly a third of the children were severely underweight.
sentence.Network_cn: 近1/3的孩子体重严重偏轻。

entry.tran: 十分严重的;极为恶劣的
entry.def: You use severe to indicate that something bad or undesirable is great or intense.

example.ex: ...a business with severe cash flow problems...
example.tran: 有严重资金周转问题的公司

example.ex: I suffered from severe bouts of depression...
example.tran: 我曾患有严重的抑郁症。

entry.tran: (惩罚、批评)严厉的，严重的，苛刻的
entry.def: Severe punishments or criticisms are very strong or harsh.

example.ex: This was a dreadful crime and a severe sentence is necessary...
example.tran: 这一罪行十分恶劣，必须要重判。

example.ex: Before she could reply, my mother launched into a severe reprimand.
example.tran: 她还没来得及回答，我妈妈就开始严厉地训斥起她来。

entry.tran: (外貌、外观)简朴的，朴素的,不加修饰的
entry.def: If you describe the appearance of someone or something as severe, you do not like its plain appearance and lack of decoration.

example.ex: ...wearing her felt hats and severe grey suits...
example.tran: 戴着她的毡帽，穿着朴素的灰色套装

example.ex: The cushions add a touch of colour in a room that might otherwise look severe.
example.tran: 靠垫给房间添了一抹亮色，不然房间看上去可能太素净了。

means.word_mean: 1. to a severe or serious degree;

sentences.sentence: "fingers so badly frozen they had to be amputated"

means.word_mean: 2. with sternness; in a severe manner;

sentences.sentence: "she was severely affected by the bank's failure"

auth_sentence.content: But men are usually more severely affected than women.
auth_sentence.res_content: But men are usually more severely affected than women.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: But men are usually more severely affected than women.

auth_sentence.content: Photos of the activist showed he was severely beaten.
auth_sentence.res_content: Photos of the activist showed he was severely beaten.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Photos of the activist showed he was severely beaten.

auth_sentence.content: Women involved in agricultural work are also severely affected.
auth_sentence.res_content: Women involved in agricultural work are also severely affected.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Women involved in agricultural work are also severely affected.

Sentence.sentence: They depend severely on family members.
Case studies of children who were isolated from others reveal that they lack a firm self-concept, and their mental and psychological development is severely hindered by lack of language.
To avoid fiscal (财政) meltdown, public pensions and health-care provision will have to be reined back severely and taxes may have to go up.

sentences.en: He has a severely restricted diet.
Access to this information is severely restricted.
sentences.cn: 这一信息的使用受到极严格的限制。

sentences.en: He was severely criticized and removed from his post.
sentences.cn: 他受到了严厉的批评并且被撤了职。

sentences.en: He is severely put down for his careless work.
sentences.cn: 他因工作上的粗心大意而受到了严厉的批评。

sentences.en: All through the faculty meeting Frank stood up for his friend who was being criticized so severely.
sentences.cn: 在全系大会上,法兰克始终维护受到严厉批判的朋友。

sentences.en: Ade and Brooks exchanged blows yesterday and they were severely punished today.
sentences.cn: 艾德和布鲁克斯昨天打起来了,今天他们受到严厉的惩罚。

sentences.en: a school for severely autistic children
sentences.cn: 为患有严重自闭症的孩子开办的学校

sentences.en: He was born with a severely deformed foot.
sentences.cn: 他生下来就有一只严重畸形的腿。

sentences.en: He was severely injured and never regained consciousness.
sentences.cn: 他严重受伤，再没恢复知觉。

sentences.en: A fire had severely damaged the warehouse.
sentences.cn: 一场大火严重地毁坏了仓库。

sentences.en: Both teams were severely depleted by injuries.
sentences.cn: 两个队都因队员受伤而实力大减。

sentences.en: By the end of the winter the supply of grain was severely depleted.
sentences.cn: 冬季快要结束时，粮食贮备已经消耗得差不多了。

sentences.en: Don’t worry about cutting the rose bushes severely,they always grow back,stronger and healthier than ever.
sentences.cn: 不必担心把玫瑰花丛剪得太厉害,花丛还会长起来的,而且会更加茂盛。

sentences.en: All cases of bullying will be severely dealt with.
sentences.cn: 所有以大欺小的情况都将受到严肃处理。
